website_summaries.verdict: This midsize Art of Shaving kit is just the right size for travel. Works well as a sampler gift before investing in a larger kit.
pros: All products are TSA-approved sizes for travel
cons: Brush has a strong chemical odor, sheds easily
Product sizes are small for the price
Pre-Shave Oil can be harsh on sensitive skin

customer_reviews.title: Not a Walmart style product
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t know anything about this brand you should know the price is too much for the size, but you’re paying for the product. It doesn’t take much to get a great lather and an awesome smooth soft shave, the scent is amazing. But you’re paying for the product. It’s not your typical Gillette, Nivea, schick, I’m going to purchase at Walmart. No you’re going to go to Nordstrom’s to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Zachariah Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Good Sizes for travel kit or home
customer_reviews.text: Art of Shaving is the best product (I have tried other brands, not an uninformed boast). The sandalwood fragrance is masculine, but not "Meathead". The pre-shave oil is tremendous for those of us with sensitive skin. The shave cream is thick/lushous but not gloppy. You can use the Shave Cream without the pre-shave oil and your blade will still glide nicely and remove hair/beard well. Only negative, the post-shave moisturizing balm could be a slightly bigger size (.5 oz) to match with the use of the Shave Cream and Pre-Shave Oil. You run out of balm way before the other products of this kit. You will like shaving again if you use this system of products.
customer_reviews.author: Jay W. Mitchell

product_meta.title: The Art of Shaving Midsize Kit, Sandalwood
product_meta.description:
The Art of Shaving Mid-Size Kit offers the 4 Elements of the Perfect Shave in a smaller size, perfect for gifting and travel as it meets TSA guidelines. Along with the right shaving implement, you are ready to Prepare, Lather up!, Shave and Moisturize. The 4 Elements of The Perfect Shave provides optimal shaving results while helping against ingrown hairs, razor burn, and nicks & cuts. Kit contains: Pre-Shave Oil (1 fl. oz.), Shaving Cream (1.5 fl. oz.), Shaving Brush, and After-Shave Balm (1 fl. oz.).

SET CONTAINS:
Shaving Brush, Sandalwood Pre-Shave Oil 1 fl. oz, Sandalwood Shaving Cream 1.5 oz, Sandalwood After-Shave Balm 1 fl. oz.
